CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Total_Outstanding_Balance_Merge__c =0,Recurring_Billing__c = TRUE), "Current and Autopay", IF(Days_Past_Due__c =0, "Current and Autopay", IF(Days_Past_Due__c <= 30 , "1-30 Days Late", IF(Days_Past_Due__c <= 60, "31-60 Days Late", IF(Days_Past_Due__c <= 90, "61-90 Days Late", "90+ Days Late")))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If there no balance OR the customer is on autopay, shows "Current and Autopay". It should be "Current OR Autopay".
CustomField.label: Account Past Due Status
